 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פָּצַל‎</span>] **verb Pi\`el** ==peel== (Late Hebrew Pi\`el ***split, divide***; so Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, Jewish-Aramaic (Talmud) <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פְּצַל‎</span>, Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; akin to  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בצל‎</span> q. v.); — ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎פִּצֵּל‎</span> [[Gen.30.38|Gen 30:38]] (object rods); ***Imperfect*** 3 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וַיְפַצֵּל‎</span> v[[Gen.30.37|Gen 30:37]] (c.accusative of congnate meaning with verb).
